functions.name: k8s_pod_periodic_evaluation_schedule
functions.description: Checks if periodic evaluation schedule is configured for k8s_batch pods.

functions.name: k8s_pod_malware_scan_schedule
functions.description: Checks if malware scan schedule is configured for k8s_batch pods.

functions.name: k8s_pod_scan_frequency_management
functions.description: Checks if scan frequency management is configured for k8s_batch pods.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_BATCH API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_BATCH is a Kubernetes component for batch job management.
Configuration, security, monitoring, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
